settings.title: Stress Free Planning
settings.subheading: Let us handle the dirty work

settings.subtitle: strong roots
settings.title: Team Builders, Corporate Events and Brand Activations
settings.text: Hosting a Bonsai Bar class gives your guests a meaningful experience that nurtures well-being and reduces stress. Our events promote healing, joy, and a positive impact on employees. Partnering with us connects your brand to wellness, mindfulness, and authentic connection.

settings.code:
Bonsai ... anywhere!

Bring Bonsai Bar’s expert instructors anywhere for a unique and impactful brand activation! Whether it’s to your office, your company's back lawn, or your countryside retreat —our team is ready to elevate your event. With coverage in 13 states and 16 markets (and counting), we can travel to bring our exciting, hands-on experience to your next event, product launch or activation. Let us create a memorable experience that leaves your audience feeling relaxed, inspired, and connected—no matter where you are!

settings.subtitle: bonsai 101
settings.title: FUN for all
settings.text: Bonsai Bar events are fun, inclusive and beginner-friendly. Each 90-minute workshop includes expert instruction, high-quality trees, and all necessary tools. Designed for success, our events also maintain an eco-friendly footprint. Group sessions typically accommodate 24 - 48 participants.

settings.title: Greens are good for you!
settings.text:
Plants purify their environments and are good for our mental health! Studies show that caring for house plants reduces stress and anxiety.

Send each team member home with a new way to care and connect with nature. Our classes even include tree followup care.

settings.title: Say cheese!
settings.text: Those instagrammable smiles for miles. Low pressure. good tunes. Great Vibes.

settings.title: A hobby for life
settings.text: Optional add-ons are available to enhance your class, providing keepsakes for your guests!

settings.title: A traveling forest
settings.text: Our planning staff will help you select from more than 200 Venues—or bring the adventure straight to you!

settings.title: Are you Bonsai Curious? Let's Chat.

settings.text: We're proud to offer top-tier Team Building, Corporate, and Brand Activation events. Let’s connect to bring the magic of bonsai to your next event. We’d love to get tiny trees into your hands and create a memorable experience together!

settings.subtitle: Hey! pro Event Planners & Brand Managers
settings.title: we do brand activations!
settings.text: Bonsai Bar is an ideal partner for your high-impact event. Let’s collaborate on unique Events and Brand Activations to create something unforgettable. Headed to the Super Bowl or Rockefeller Center? We are a premium, agile partner ready to elevate your brand.
